评论详情: These pants are SO CUTE. They fit perfectly, are SO comfortable, and the material is soft but sturdy. It’s like getting to wear pajama pants to work. My only complaint is they are wayyy too long for my 5’1” self. Even with heels I have to take a few inches off. So if you’re maybe 5’5” or taller, they’ll be perfect. But for my short girlies… prepare to have them hemmed. Still worth it, but it was enough to take a star off.
Best tummy control ever and super soft fabric!
These pants are worth their weight in gold! Super soft and stretchy.  Elevates your look at work!
I liked the fabric and style but the length is too short. It m 5’8” and the pants sit above my foot.  Can’t wear them with hills. It’ll look odd even with flats.

These are the cutest pants. They are very comfortable and true to size. I have worn them several times and they seem to be very durable. I get a lot of compliments. I have order in several colors. You can wear them in summer and winter.
I’m 5’9 and these were a little too short for me but overall good quality.

I’ve totally fallen in love with these work pants! The fit is amazing! I'm 5'2“ 130 lbs and I wear a small in these. I usually stick to heels, so I’m not quite sure how the length would work with flats. I did notice that my gray pair feels a bit tighter compared to my black pair, even though they’re both the same size. But overall, they’re pretty true to size! I carry a little more weight in my thighs and lower body, and these pants fit me really well!
These pants are really cute, love how they fit.

I'm not one to leave reviews, especially when it comes to clothes from Amazon. These pants were perfect! They are definitely true to size but extremely comfortable and some room for movement! If you are debating on buying these, do it!!
These pants are great quality. They are a thick material and are very comfortable. Have a little difficulty keeping the belt tied but no complaints other than that
Material very flimsy.  Style very different than expected

Love them

These took quite some time to arrive, so order with plenty of time if you need them for an event. However, they were SO comfortable & I received many compliments. I love these pants. Very comfortable and great fit. I’m 5’9 and weigh 140 pounds and the medium is a great size. Great for Christmas season.
Beautiful but too short to wear with heels.
These may be the best pants I’ve ever purchased. Soft, flattering, lay great, not to thin as some have said, I was impressed by the weight. I’m 5’4” 155# the fit perfect! Will be buying another pair.
Absolutely love these pants. Fit perfect and so comfortable

These pants are quite amazing. I have them in black, coffee, and dusty blue. They fit perfectly, lightweight material, very flattering, and quality is great. Colors are also super cute. Perfect for an interview outfit, office/work pant, or if you need a semi-formal pant for an event.
These pants are so cute! I weight 130 pounds and 5”3. I ordered a size small and they fit perfectly. Only complaint would be the color. They are definitely orange and not a shade of brown.

I like these pants. The style is cute, the size is correct, the length is good. My only gripe is the material is a little thin so it makes me feel like I need shape wear for lumps and bumps. It could also just be the color but I’ll keep them and see if ever there’s a chance to wear them.

Looked very nice but noticed they pilled after 1 wear. This was on my back area where my purse might have been hanging. That’s all I can think.

Sometimes ya never know what you're gonna get, but these pants are actually very nice for warm days or cool evenings. Because the material being lightweight polyester, which I call rayon, they're gonna be wrinkly when you get them and you will have to steam them after washing. I did wash them in warm water and put them in a warm dryer, took them out while they were damp, but no matter how you wash them, steam them. They have a zipper, button and belt. Other than that, I'm 5' 1" 136 lbs, bought a small and they fit very nice with the length long enough to wear a short heel without them dragging on the ground. They hide the belly bulge so you can wear a top tucked in. They're very flattering pants. I'm wearing them with a tuxedo shirt and bow tie.

Beautiful and as pictured. Flowy and fit me well.

I have to admit I am a little jealous of all the reviews stating these are too long, fit great and need to size down--That is not my experience! I am 5-11 (yes, I knew they were going to be too short, but two previous pairs of pants from this brand are just long enough for flats). I wonder if the mocha brown color might have a different sizing than other colors because, there is no way the XL is true to size! It was at least two sizes too small in the waist and hips, especially for having elastic! The measurement for waist size must have been taken with the elastic stretched to maximum. Or maybe mine is mislabeled? Even the length is shorter than it is supposed to be. I might try again and see what happens in another color and the same color.

I loved the style, fit, color, and comfort of these pants. However, the white color is see through, so I had to return them.

Finally a pair of pants that I don’t have to have altered because they are to long. I am 5’1 and they come right to my heel without any type of heels on. Quality and color of these are wonderful. Good length for feels or flats. Top of the pant does not have much elasticity and cuts into hip.
I live in warm weather, so the fabric is great. It doesn’t wrinkle through the day. Washed just fine. They are beautiful on. I am 5’2”, 130 and I got a size small. Perfect length and waist.

These pants are amazing. They have the button in the front, but also a piece of elastic band in the back. Super comfortable, don't cut in, and look nice with the bow detail. For reference, I'm 5'1" and 120lbs and the small fits perfectly

Wish the waist gave a little more

Unfortunately my build isn’t the most flattering but for those more petite gals these dress slacks fit comfortably not too baggy. Im on the shorter side and wore 4 inch wedges so the pants wouldn’t drag. Most favorite part was the pockets. The fabrics wrinkles a tad. The color was exactly what I was looking for. The fabric wasn’t too heavy and was very breathable.

I was a little skeptical, as I'm over 5'9" and finding something 'high waisted' thats the right fit is occasionally a difficult journey. Needed new pants for a last minute trip with work, and took a shot in the dark with these. Super comfortable and very flattering, got multiple compliments. Will be buying more, as they are pretty much my new favorite work pant.

These pants are soooo comfortable! They are lightweight, but I only gave four stars because they have some sturdiness/weight to them in a good way. They are not see-through or flimsy. They are well stitched and have a cute sash tie in the front of them (or side or back if you choose) so you can tuck in a shirt/bodysuit/blouse or wear with a cropped top that sits just at the waist-line and still be suitable for work! I actually got these after ordering another pair just like them in a khaki/olive green. They are nice enough to wear to work all day and then out for the evening. Also easily made more casual with tennis shoes/sandals and a tank top or t-shirt. Easy to wash in cold water and hang dry or tumble dry on gentle. If you iron them, do so inside out and on low to avoid marking material.

These black pants are very comfortable, and I love that the bow kind of conceals My tummy. I think they’re very versatile. I wore this outfit to work, but I also think this summer I compare it with a tank top for more casual look.
Stylish and good fit
I purchased one pair and 3 days later ordered another one in different color. I was pleasantly surprised with look and feel. This material is lightweight and quality is amazing.
These are for giants.  Kidding, but I'm 5'4" and I would have to cut off a foot to make these work.  If you have a kangaroo pouch it's a little much but that's okay I'm used to it.
Although these look "relaxed" fit, they are cut trim through the hips & thighs. If you have any shape go up at least 2 sizes.

These pants aren’t bad overall. The color is great. The fit is great. They look good on. They just drag on the floor because I’m short. I don’t wear them often because of how long they are and I haven’t taken them to get hemmed. They are comfortable and it reminds me of wearing pajamas but looks professional. If you aren’t short I would recommend these pants.
